Service: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines

Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and SQL Server performance tools to continuously monitor database performance metrics such as CPU usage, memory consumption, and query execution times.
Regularly apply security patches and updates to SQL Server and the underlying operating system to protect against vulnerabilities.
Schedule and perform regular backups of SQL Server databases using Azure Backup or other backup solutions. Ensure backups are stored securely and are accessible for restoration.
Test and validate the integrity of database backups to ensure they can be restored successfully in case of data loss or corruption.
Perform regular database maintenance tasks such as index optimization, statistics updates, and query tuning to improve performance.
Track disk space usage on the virtual machine hosting SQL Server to ensure sufficient storage is available for database growth and operations.
Set up and regularly test a disaster recovery plan using Azure Site Recovery or other tools to ensure business continuity in case of system failure.
Conduct regular security audits to ensure compliance with organizational policies and industry standards. Check for unauthorized access and vulnerabilities.
Review and update SQL Server configuration settings to align with best practices and changing application requirements.
Run regular health checks on SQL Server instances to identify and resolve issues such as database corruption or service interruptions.
Regularly rotate encryption keys used for securing sensitive data in SQL Server databases to enhance security.
Keep documentation up-to-date for SQL Server configurations, maintenance procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform failover tests to ensure high availability configurations, such as Always On Availability Groups, function correctly.
Ensure SQL Server licensing is compliant with Microsoft policies and organizational requirements.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new SQL Server features, best practices, and security measures.
